mission.title: Our Mission: Yoga for All of Cuba
mission.subtitle: Breaking geographic barriers to bring the light of Kundalini Yoga to every corner of our island
mission.description: The Golden Routes are the heart of ACIKY's expansion across Cuba. Our certified instructors travel from main centers to other provinces, bringing the teachings of Kundalini Yoga to communities that don't have regular access to these transformative practices.

process.title: How Do Golden Routes Work?
process.subtitle: The complete process from planning to establishing local communities

step1.title: 1. Need Identification
step1.text: We identify communities interested in Kundalini Yoga through local contacts and direct requests.

step2.title: 2. Route Planning
step2.text: We coordinate dates, transportation, lodging, and local spaces. We select specialized instructors.

step3.title: 3. Travel & Immersion
step3.text: Our instructors travel and temporarily settle in the community, creating authentic connections.

step4.title: 4. Intensive Teaching
step4.text: We offer workshops, open classes, group meditations, and basic training.

step5.title: 5. Local Group Establishment
step5.text: We identify local leaders and train them to maintain the practice.

step6.title: 6. Follow-up & Support
step6.text: We maintain regular contact, schedule reinforcement visits, and offer continuous support.
